choices: Her tummy growls (you get her a bottle.)
1.content:
You were walking home from the arcade downtown after getting the top score on the space themed pinball machine. When suddenly when you take a step your foot hit... nothing as you look down and see a purple energy hole in the ground. Unable to react in time you fall down into what seems to be an endless void as the hole you fell threw vanishes. In your panic you hardly see all the holes that form and vanish all over as you fall. Just as you start to calm down a hole forms under you and you all threw to hit some kind of padding but get so winded you pass out just as you see the dark form of someone large over you.

When you wake up you see that your in a cage of some kind. Looking around you see your on a shelf surrounded by several things. Just then 2 giant anthro women, a pink panther and a purple hyena walked in. "Oh hears one" said the hyena as she grabbed a strange device off the shelf next to you. "Oh look Bridget, a humane!" The hyena said excitedly to the panther. "I hear the make great pets for kids and can even babysit the little one good!" said the hyena as she looked at a tag with symbols you don't recognize on your cage and let out a whistle at your price. "Oh well I have a perfectly good 16 year old to watch Jeera for free." As the hyena backed off the panther came up to check out your price tag. "For that it better be fully trained." She got closer to examine you, reaching in with one clawed finger in at you "P-Please." You manage to say in fear. She seamed surprised that you can talk and stopped to think about it for a moment before grabbing the cage and carrying you off to buy you.

The trip was long and boring. When you got to her house you see a black panther man sitting on a couch. He looked up and instantly saw you. "What is that for?" He asked pointing at you. "I hear the are good babysitters and pets. I got it to look after Rose to free up some time for us." She said as she sets down the cage and opens it to take you out. As she hold you up by your shirt the man looks sceptically at you. "You really think this little thing can watch over our little angel?" He asked. "Well I'm willing to try. and if it doesn't do a good job it will be the most expensive meal I ever prepared." She said to you as she walked off with you

Your brought into a pink room with polka dot carpet and a few toys around on the floor and some kind of cat tree stile junglejim in the corner, a small fridge next to a small cabinet on the floor. The panther points to the fridge and said "Baby bottle." Then to the cabinet next to it. "Diaper supply's." She then takes you over to a crib were you see a pink baby panther in just a diaper with a birthmark that looks like a rose on her belly. She sleeps peacefully with her thumb in her mouth. As the mom sets you down in the crib the baby stirred and rose up. Taking her thumb out of her mouth to rub her eyes. When she stops she looks right at you before quickly pulling you in to a hug. "NEW DOLLY!" She shouts excitedly "I'm not a dolly!" you say. She loosens her hug to look down at you "Your alive? Sowee." "Don't apologize deer i got him just for you. hes your new playmate. And if you have any problems like your hungry or need a change and I are your daddy are not around he will take care of it for you ok?" She asked as she picked up her baby who was still holding you and set you down both down on the floor. "K mommy." She replied happily as she released her hug and let you get up. "Ok sweaty you have fun with your new playmate now." She said as she walked out of the room and shut the door. The large baby then leaned closer to you with an excited look on her face. "My names Rose whats yours?" She asked happily. "Um, Ken, nice to meet you." She seems to be concentrating for a moment.

http://gloverboy23.deviantart.com/galler...
1.title: Your new home.

choices: Explore other parts of the junglejim
Jeera the hyena comes over for a play date.
the mom returns. to take Rose to the living room for her favorite tv show.
They go to the backyard to play.
12.content:
She looks strait at you for a moment with a look of concentration before a loud and unmistakable sound of a stomach growling. Her eyes begin to water. "No no no! Don't cry! Wait right here I'll get you something." With that you run over to the mini fridge and with some strain pull it open. You try to pull out one of the cold bottles of milk but they were held in my some metal thing. "Ug what do you got to do to get the milk out!?" You cry in frustration. "Milk." A feminine computer voice said as one bottle was moved into a small compartment on the inner left side before a glass lid slid over it and it glowed while rotating the bottle like a microwave before a green light dinged and it opened up. With a couscous hand you feel the bottle to see its slightly warm. "Ok..." You take the heavy bottle and dragged it out. Luckily the fridge's door closed on its own when you cleared it. You pulled and pulled on the bottle hopping the bottles lid don't pop off as its what your griping as you pull it along. You continue to pull it along until you run into something soft, warm, and furry. Looking up you see the smiling face of Rose looking down at you as her two hands come up on ether side of you and take the bottle. She lifts it up to make an opening for you, witch you quickly take. She sets her bottle down gripping the bottom with her feet and rolling onto her back to drink. As the milk slowly vanished from the bottle you just sat and watched, thinking about your situation. when suddenly you heard your own stomach growl. Looking down at it you remember you were heading home for lunch when you got sucked into this world. Looking up you see that Rose is holding up her bottle to you. "Milk?" She offers. Thinking about it you were hungry and the way her parents were treating you you doubt they wold feed you right now. "Thank you" You say as you use your hand to wipe her baby drool from the bottle's nipple before putting your own mouth on it. This milk was, sweet. You didn't want to take much from her so you only drank what you needed to quiet your stomach. When you pull away she roles back onto her back and finishes her milk.

When she finished the bottle she sat up and set it down beside her. A sound like something bubbling up inside her causes her to show a look of discomfort. Remembering seeing what your mom did for your baby brother you quickly run around behind her and instruct her to lean forward. When she dose you climb onto her back and with both hands start patting. But nothing happens. So you slowly start putting more force into your pats until your all out pounding on her back when (BUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP) With the job done you jump back down. Giggling Rose stands up and turns to look down at you with a huge smile on her face. It was just then that it sunk in just how much bigger she is then you. Your only as big as one of her legs. "Come on! Lets go play on my jungle-jim, the slide is fun!" She said happily as she turns to the junglejim. Doing as you were told you follow as Rose crawls threw a tunnel. You go in but after a short distance it goes strait up with a ladder all covered in carpet. You have a hard time with the ladder, forced to slide up a side pole and pull yourself up. You can still feel the walls shake slightly at Rose's movements until you hear her squeal with joy as she slides down. You hear her run back around and looking down you see her coming back up the tunnel. "Go, slide!" She said to you excitedly. "This is as fast as I can climb this." You say back. She climbs up and quickly reaches you. She bights down onto your shirt with her toothless mouth and carries you up the ladder and sets you down. She crawls over you then lies down on her belly. "Get on." She tells you threw giggles. Doing as your told you get a good grip on her shoulders and ride the rest of the way including another ladder. Not even giving you the chance to get off she slid down on her belly bringing you along for the ride. This continued for a while, she wold take you up and ride back down. Tho after so many runs you cold see that she was getting tired of the slide.

12.title: Her tummy growls (you get her a bottle.)

choices: "No I'll go get my mommy to change me."
"I don't want to stop for a change I want to keep playing!"
123.content:
As you were riding on Rose's back with your arms around her neck she bends over to one side about ready to enter the junglejim when the movement causes you to slide over her shoulder. You hung on to her neck so now you hanging from her front. She stands back up and looks down at you with a smile as she brings her arms around you. Apparently she thought you wanted a hug.

Suddenly the door swung open and Rose quickly turned to look. Turning your head as much as you can you see her mom and the hyena woman she was with when she bought you. Looking down you see a baby hyena with purple fur and what looked like a birthmark of a laughing heart on her belly as she ran over with her arms open wide. Rose opened her arms as well and before you had time to drop down and get out of the way you where crushed between the two giant baby's bellies as they gave each other a tight hug. The new baby who was a head taller then Rose looked down at you sandwiched between them before pulling back. You fell to the ground and were quickly snatched up by the baby hyena. "Rose! Is this your new toy human my mommy said you got!?" Rose got confused before turning to her own mother. "Mommy is Ken a toy?" You wanted to say then and there that your not a toy bot her mam answered first. "Its your pet. But you can treat it like a toy. Just don't break it, its expensive." Just before the tow adults left the room they said in unison "You to have fun." And the door was closed.

"Jeera want to play a game?" Rose asked the baby hyena causing her lo lift you up to Rose's face. "Lets play something with this!" Jeera replied. Rose looked down at you in thought before an idea hits her. "Lets play house! I'll be the mommy, you can be the daddy, and Ken can be the baby!" Rose said and Jeera agreed. As Rose ran over to prepare the game Jeera ran off to the closet and pulled out a box full of doll cloths and accessories of all sizes. Before you realized whats happening she grads the bottom back of your shirt and forcefully pulls it off of you before casually tossing it in the box with the rest of the doll cloths. You struggle and protest as she pulls off your shoes but its no use. Shes to strong. When she finishes tossing your socks and shoes in the box she works on your pants. You struggle, you beg, you try to hold on tight but she pulls them away and into the box they go. In desperation you grab onto you underwear but thankfully she stopped. With one hand on your chest she kept you pinned to the ground wile the other rummages threw the box. She lets out a giggle as she finds what shes looking for and pulls out a small cloth diaper for a baby doll. She quickly folds it over your underwear and seals it with some kind of velcro on the tabs. Then she reached back in and pulled out a dress your size with pictures of baby ducks on it. There must be normal animals on this world. She stands you up and dresses you in it before reaching in the box again and pulling out a plastic toy pacifier and shoving it into your mouth. With the hard plastic in your mouth she picks you up and holds you in one arm like a teddy bear as she walked over to Rose.

"Honey, I'm home!" Jeera calls in the deepest voice she cold. "Welcome home! Did baby have fun at the park?" replied Rose in a high pitched voice. "Oh yes she played lots." Said Jeera as Rose walked up and kissed Jerra on the cheek before squishing you between them in another hug. Then she leaned down and gave you a sloppy kiss on the cheek before rubbing the side of her face against the top of her head and letting out a happy purr. When she pulls back she turns back to Jeera "Can you watch the baby more while I go shopping?" She asked Jeera "Yes I can sit our baby." She replied as Rose walked off. Jeera walked over to a small tea party table with plastic kiddie chairs. She took a stuffed toy off the chair and tossed it aside before setting you down on it on your back. "Time to babysit." Jeera said as she turned around and you saw her big poofy diapered butt come down on you. "NO!" You cried as you raised your arms and legs to stop her from landing on you. Yo your surprise and hers by the way shes looking down at you your managing to hold her up. After the shock passed Jerra went into a giggle fit as she lifted her legs and let the full weight of her body down on you. You can't get over hoe light she is. Shes still very heavy, but at her size she should be much heaver. You hear the pitter patter of relatively little feet as Rose rushes over. "Ken are you ok?" She asked in a worried tone before looking down at you holding up Jeera. "Look Rose its holding me up!" Jeera said excitedly. Rose bent down to look you in the eyes. "Are you hurt?" she asked with a look of genuine concern on her face. "I'm ok...But shes kind of heavy." When you said this the two girls start laughing uncontrollably. Rose falls back onto her bottom and roles onto her back, her feet kicking in the air as she roles on the floor. Meanwhile your having a harder time keeping Jeera up with her laughing so hard. When it finally passes you hear a noise come from Jeera before a foul smell fills the air as you see her diaper above you expand under her butt and it turns a slight color of brown. Jerra then lets out a sigh of relief as Rose sits back up and brings her head in close to you and sniffs the air a few times before pulling back to look up at her friend. "Mommy said that Ken can do stuff like change diapees and get bottles when hungry in stuff. He got me my bottle after nap time and did good. If you want he can change your diapee." Rose said. Jeera looked down at Rose while she was still sitting on you and said_________________________________.
123.title: Baby sitting game.

choices: No. (Rose hears this and lifts Jeera's legs for you.)
1231.content: Jeera gets up off you and walks over the the changing mat and lies down waiting for her change. You sit there gasping for fresh air. " Well Ken? are you going to change Jeera?" Rose said. "Do I really have to? I'm only a quarter of his size. "Yes because you are my pet and mommy said you do what i want and i want you to change Jeera's stinky diapy" She said with a giggle. You cringe back a little and seeing this Rose gave you the puppy eyes. "Pweeeese" You sigh as you slowly make your way to Jeera. Every step you take the smell gets stronger and stronger and you start holding your nose. You make in front of Jeera's diaper and you are only a little more then a head taller. You drag yourself to the right side of her diaper to unstrap it. Jeera is smiling down at you Excited since she has never been changed by a little human. You pull as hard as you can unstrapping the right side and the smell gets stronger and your face turns green. Jeera and Rose giggle thinking it was funny that the smell was getting to you. You walk to the other side and unstrap the diaper. It folds open showing the damage Jeera has done. You back away but you hit a white crinkly wall. You look up and see Rose sitting over you watching you giggling. "Hurry so we can get back to playing" Rose said with glee. After what felt like hours you suck it up and walk up to Jeera's now open diaper trying not to look back. You go to get wipes which proved difficult since the box of wipes are bigger then you. You then drag over baby power and another diaper. After about 5 minutes getting all the things you need you run into a big problem (literally) "Um Jerra?" You say a little nervous. "What is it Toy?" She says in an annoyed tone. "Well you are really big and heavy to me and i can't get the diaper out from under you, so could you lift your butt up so i can clean you up and get the new diaper on?" You ask.

as they are closing you in you hope that they are are kidding. well turns out they wernt you heard laughter coming from outside the warm wet smelly diaper because rosie just went it. jeera laughed 12313211.title: stuck

12313212.content: As you look around, your eyes widen before you start to fearfully shiver, realizing where you are. As you try to calm down so you can think of ways to escape, the diaper opens back up and you're lifted up, being taken back out. Once the hand opens up, you see it was Rose who took you back out. As you look at her face, you see that she seems...
12313212.title: kidding

123132121.content: When you look up at her, you see she is looking down at you with what seems to be concern. Before you can say anything, she asks "Are you okay?". After she says this, you realize she must of felt you shaking. While you try to finish calming down, you manage to nod "I-umm-I guess." You close your eyes as you start to breathe deeply before finishing "Ju-Just please do-don't do that again." you beg, looking down as you get a little worried that she'll be mad for saying that. As you continue looking down, you feel some pressure on your head, causing you to curiously look up. When you look up, you see that Rose is stroking the top of your head. Although it hurts a little, you can tell she's trying to comfort you from the apologetic look on her face as she does it. Once she notices you looking back up at her, she nods, understanding the reason, before replying "Ok. I promise I won't. But I can't say she won't." indicating towards Jeera, who is laughing hysterically at the time. You breathe a sigh of relief as she responds with that before thanking her as she sets you down next to her, quietly muttering to herself, trying to think of something to do next.
123132121.title: Worried

choices: something happen during the night or in a dream?
1231321212.content: Shortly after Rose sets you down, you hear footsteps heading towards the room. Once they reach the room, you realize it was Jeeras' mother getting her to take her home. After everyone has said their goodbye's, you look up at Rose and see that she is having problems keeping her eyes open before asking "Are you tired?". She slowly nods at this, then picks you up, climbing up her crib, setting you down as she lies down in it. You walk over to the other side and, grabbing the edge of a blanket, cover her up with it. Just a little after you've finished, you hear her giggle quietly before grabbing you again, holding you similar to how any child would hold a plushy as she falls asleep. When she falls asleep, you feel her arms relax a bit. Though you still can't get away from her, you aren't being held too tightly anymore. After a while, you begin to relax as well, slowly starting to fall asleep, too.
1231321212.title: sleep

12313212121.content: Did something happen to you or did you have a dream
12313212121.title: something happen during the night or in a dream?

123132121212.content:
You wake up in your own bed at home. “Oh it was only a dream.” And start laughing. Going down stairs you call to see if your friends want to hang out today. You meet up with them and play some games at the arcade, before it’s time to go back home. As you all are walking the ground starts to shake. Looking around your friends have vanished and the town looks deserted. Running as fast as you can you head for your house a few blocks away. Your almost there when the shaking starts again and a shadow looms over you. Looking up you see rose is walking down your street.

“Oh a toy!” She squeals as she runs towards you. You turn to run away, but don’t get far before you trip and fall. Turning over onto your back, you scream as Rose’s foot rises above you and lowers towards you fast as she is about to step on you.

You wake up screaming laying on roses belly. She had rolled onto her back and her arms at up near her head. You take a few breaths as you try to calm down from the dream. Rose wasn’t awakened by your scream. You really miss your home and friends and will try to get back to them. You wish this was the dream, but until then your here to stay. Laying back down you try relaxing and soon you fall back asleep to the rhythm of Roses heart beat and breathing.
123132121212.title: You have a dream

12313212122.content: So who woke up first?
12313212122.title: skip to morning.

info.brief_description: You get sucked into another world of giant furrys and wind up a pet for a furry child.
info.description:
When your walking home one day without warning a hole in time and space opens up under you and you fall into a world of anthros were humans are considered inferior and kept as pets, slaves, and in some parts of this world, food. Your caught and sold to a panther to be a pet and caretaker for her baby Rose. Despite being a baby around one years old she can talk just fine. Being so young she hasn't had the idea that humans are lower beings crammed into her head yet but will that last? Her parents will for the most part ignore you except when Rose draws attention to you or when they feed you awful dry pet food and water. Luckily Rose will occasionally sneak real food from the fridge for you. Things that are expected of you is to not only be her playmate but to look after her by bringing her her bottle from a mini fridge in the room when shes hungry and changing her when she uses her diaper and taking care of her when shes sick. You actual have fun with her playing games and going on little adventures. She can be a little ruff with you at time because shes to young to know her strength, or yours for that mater for if she can't reach something she gets you to give her a boost despite being little over twice your height. You just can't bring yourself to say no to her. Being a cat she is exceptionally good at climbing things like bookcases and such. She is influenced by her friends she will pick up a few things from them.


This work is inspired by the work of Gloverboy23 from DA only a changed the story consent around to make it more interesting. Hear are some pictures of rose and you (Ken) To show you what she and you look like and give you a good example of the size difference.

She doesn't know quite what to think of you but finds you useful at reaching things in places even they are to small to reach. She sees you as a well trained pet.

Rose will protect you from her if she gets to ruff. She likes butt jokes and will store you in her diaper if she needs her hands and doesn't want to put you down. She will also use you as a seat cushion.

Rules.
#1 keep it clean.
#2 keep to the characters personalty.
#3 Please put some effort in your adds no one liners.
#4 the characters can get hurt but not killed.
